pr_title: [BEAM-10925] Create interface for SQL Java aggregate function.

timeline.bodyText: Do you think whether we should start by adding @Experimental?
timeline.author: amaliujia

+
+import java.io.Serializable;
+import org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.Combine;
+
+/** An aggregate function that can be executed as part of a SQL query. */
+public class AggregateFn implements Serializable {
